data.name: Mistika VR Connect
data.description:
IMPORTANT: Mistika VR Connect is an add-on feature for Mistika VR.  To use it, you must connect the application with the host desktop version of Mistika VR. To learn more visit www.sgo.es/mistika-vr-connect 

Ready to take your immersive media creation to a whole new level? 

With Mistika VR Connect you’re able to stitch 360º/180º VR media directly in Meta Quest 2 headset, using some of the most popular features of the industry’s favorite optical flow stitching software Mistika VR. 

This innovative application allows you to manipulate your stitches to perfection and speeds up feedback cycles by providing (remote) VR output for your clients or team members in real-time.

Features:
NEW: Autocalibration tool
Mistika VR essentials: 
Improve Offsets
Improve Angels
Match Color
Match Color in time
Color Management
Edge Points
Camera Yaw, Pitch and Roll parameters 
Camera Temperature exposure and tint controls 

Like the application? Give us a shout!
Instagram: @sgomistika 
FB: @sgo_mistika
